name: Pop-up Menu - glossy background
description:
Adds a glossy background to all drop-down menus and context menu pop-ups.
Does NOT seem to work on Windows Aero (Vista and 7). I don't know how it works on newer Windows versions.
additional_info:
Requires style 8414 to work: Set all "-moz-border-radius:" to 4px.

I used code from some of user 7858's userstyles in this, so I'll credit him 
for making 
style 8414 and 
style 8028, which gave me the idea for this.
